staticBinding.value: UPDATE SERVER SET TODELETE = to_date('${deleteDate}','DD-MM-YY') WHERE hostname = '${server.hostname}'
Attention: This server is marked for deletion!
SELECT OS FROM TSHIRTSIZES WHERE TSHIRTSIZE = '${server.tshirtsize}'

The Server '${server.hostname}' was marked for deletion. Therefore it was shutdown.
Please ignore any ticket regarding this server until further notice.

Best regards
Delivery Team
